author: dock_boss
content: I am finalizing the JSON-RPC spec. I was asked to note which endpoints are going to be deprecated after The Merge. I haven't seen any discussions about it so I would like to get some consensus before I just do it.

author: dock_boss
content:
These are the endpoints I can think of:
eth_coinbase
eth_etherbase (if any client other than Geth even has it) 
eth_mining
eth_getWork
eth_submitWork
eth_hashrate
eth_submitHashrate

author: dock_boss
content:
I have also thought about deprecrating these endpoints ater The Merge as well.
The few people I asked about it told me that they still could be useful to users who want to get hisrotical data about Uncle blocks.
Which makes sense to me, but am I correct in saying that they should probably be deprecated after "four fours" is implemented?
eth_getUncleCountByNumber
eth_getUncleCountByHash
eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex
eth_getUncleByBlockNumberAndIndex
